source:
# OpenHack MDWH - Azure Synapse Analytics Demo

## Challenge 4 - More than meets the eye - Catalog Data

#### Project URL
- <https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse>

#### Developer
Andre Essing
- <https://www.andre-essing.de/>
- <https://github.com/aessing>
- <https://twitter.com/aessing>
- <https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/>

> THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
## Import libraries

from pyspark.sql.types import StringType, TimestampType, DateType, IntegerType, DecimalType, BooleanType, StructType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, udf, greatest, explode
import uuid
## Define functions
uuidUDF = udf(lambda : str(uuid.uuid4()),StringType())
## Southridge - Import data

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Catalog = spark.read.option("multiLine", "true").json('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/Movies/export.json')

df_Southridge_Catalog = (
    df_Southridge_Catalog
        .withColumn('actor', explode('actors.name'))
        .drop('actors', '_attachments', '_etag', '_rid', '_self', '_ts')
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Catalog.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_Catalog.limit(100))
## Fourth Coffee - Import data

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee_Actors = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/Actors.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_Actors.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_Actors.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/MovieActors.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee_Movies = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/Movies.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_Movies.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_Movies.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee_OnlineMovieMappings = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/OnlineMovieMappings.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_OnlineMovieMappings.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_OnlineMovieMappings.limit(100))
## Fourth Coffee - Join data

# Join dataframes
df_FourthCoffee_Catalog = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Movies.alias("Movies")
        .join(df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors.alias("MovieActors"), df_FourthCoffee_Movies.MovieID == df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors.MovieID, 'left')
        .join(df_FourthCoffee_Actors.alias("Actors"), df_FourthCoffee_MovieActors.ActorID == df_FourthCoffee_Actors.ActorID, 'left')
        .join(df_FourthCoffee_OnlineMovieMappings.alias("Mappings"), df_FourthCoffee_Movies.MovieID == df_FourthCoffee_OnlineMovieMappings.MovieID, 'left')
)

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_Catalog.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_Catalog.limit(100))
## VanArsdel - Import data

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel_Actors = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.Actors.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_Actors.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_Actors.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel_MovieActors = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.MovieActors.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_MovieActors.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_MovieActors.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel_Movies = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.Movies.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_Movies.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_Movies.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel_OnlineMovieMappings = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.OnlineMovieMappings.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_Movies.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_Movies.limit(100))
## VanArsdel - Join data

# Join dataframes
df_vanArsdel_Catalog = (
    df_vanArsdel_Movies.alias("Movies")
        .join(df_vanArsdel_MovieActors.alias("MovieActors"), df_vanArsdel_Movies.MovieID == df_vanArsdel_MovieActors.MovieID, 'left')
        .join(df_vanArsdel_Actors.alias("Actors"), df_vanArsdel_MovieActors.ActorID == df_vanArsdel_Actors.ActorID, 'left')
        .join(df_vanArsdel_OnlineMovieMappings.alias("Mappings"), df_vanArsdel_Movies.MovieID == df_vanArsdel_OnlineMovieMappings.MovieID, 'left')
)

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_Catalog.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_Catalog.limit(100))
## Southridge - Transform data

# Add columns
df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Catalog
        .withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("1").cast(IntegerType()))
        .withColumn("SouthridgeMovieID", col("id").cast(StringType()))
        .withColumn("ActorID", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
        .withColumn("ActorGender", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
)

# Rename columns
df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified
        .withColumnRenamed("id", "SourceSystemMovieID")
        .withColumnRenamed("actor", "ActorName")
        .withColumnRenamed("title", "Title")
        .withColumnRenamed("genre", "Genre")
        .withColumnRenamed("rating", "Rating")
        .withColumnRenamed("runtime", "RuntimeMinutes")
        .withColumnRenamed("releaseYear", "TheatricalReleaseYear")
        .withColumnRenamed("availabilityDate", "PhysicalAvailabilityDate")
        .withColumnRenamed("streamingAvailabilityDate", "StreamingAvailabilityDate")
)

# Reorder colums
df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified = df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'SourceSystemMovieID',
    'SouthridgeMovieID',
    'ActorID',
    'ActorName',
    'ActorGender',
    'Title',
    'Genre',
    'Rating',
    'RuntimeMinutes',
    'TheatricalReleaseYear',
    'PhysicalAvailabilityDate',
    'StreamingAvailabilityDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemMovieID", col("SourceSystemMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("SouthridgeMovieID", col("SouthridgeMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorID", col("ActorID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorName", col("ActorName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorGender", col("ActorGender").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Title", col("Title").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Genre", col("Genre").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Rating", col("Rating").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("RuntimeMinutes", col("RuntimeMinutes").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("TheatricalReleaseYear", col("TheatricalReleaseYear").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("PhysicalAvailabilityDate", col("PhysicalAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("StreamingAvailabilityDate", col("StreamingAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified.limit(100))
## Fourth Coffee - Transform data

# Add columns
df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Catalog
        .withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("2").cast(IntegerType()))
        .withColumn("TheatricalReleaseYear", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
        .withColumn("StreamingAvailabilityDate", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified = df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'Movies.MovieID',
    'OnlineMovieID',
    'Actors.ActorID',
    'ActorName',
    'Gender',
    'MovieTitle',
    'Category',
    'Rating',
    'RunTimeMin',
    'TheatricalReleaseYear',
    'ReleaseDate',
    'StreamingAvailabilityDate'
)

# Rename columns
df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified
        .withColumnRenamed("MovieID", "SourceSystemMovieID")
        .withColumnRenamed("OnlineMovieID", "SouthridgeMovieID")
        .withColumnRenamed("Gender", "ActorGender")
        .withColumnRenamed("MovieTitle", "Title")
        .withColumnRenamed("Category", "Genre")
        .withColumnRenamed("RunTimeMin", "RuntimeMinutes")
        .withColumnRenamed("ReleaseDate", "PhysicalAvailabilityDate")
)

# Convert column types
df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemMovieID", col("SourceSystemMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("SouthridgeMovieID", col("SouthridgeMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorID", col("ActorID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorName", col("ActorName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorGender", col("ActorGender").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Title", col("Title").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Genre", col("Genre").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Rating", col("Rating").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("RuntimeMinutes", col("RuntimeMinutes").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("TheatricalReleaseYear", col("TheatricalReleaseYear").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("PhysicalAvailabilityDate", col("PhysicalAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("StreamingAvailabilityDate", col("StreamingAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified.printSchema()
#display(df_FourthCoffee_Catalog_Modified.limit(100))
## VanArsdel - Transform data

# Add columns
df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_vanArsdel_Catalog
        .withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("3").cast(IntegerType()))
        .withColumn("TheatricalReleaseYear", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
        .withColumn("StreamingAvailabilityDate", lit(None).cast(StringType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified = df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'Movies.MovieID',
    'OnlineMovieID',
    'Actors.ActorID',
    'ActorName',
    'Gender',
    'MovieTitle',
    'Category',
    'Rating',
    'RunTimeMin',
    'TheatricalReleaseYear',
    'ReleaseDate',
    'StreamingAvailabilityDate'
)

# Rename columns
df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified
        .withColumnRenamed("MovieID", "SourceSystemMovieID")
        .withColumnRenamed("OnlineMovieID", "SouthridgeMovieID")
        .withColumnRenamed("Gender", "ActorGender")
        .withColumnRenamed("MovieTitle", "Title")
        .withColumnRenamed("Category", "Genre")
        .withColumnRenamed("RunTimeMin", "RuntimeMinutes")
        .withColumnRenamed("ReleaseDate", "PhysicalAvailabilityDate")
)

# Convert column types
df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified = (
    df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemMovieID", col("SourceSystemMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("SouthridgeMovieID", col("SouthridgeMovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorID", col("ActorID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorName", col("ActorName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ActorGender", col("ActorGender").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Title", col("Title").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Genre", col("Genre").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("Rating", col("Rating").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("RuntimeMinutes", col("RuntimeMinutes").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("TheatricalReleaseYear", col("TheatricalReleaseYear").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("PhysicalAvailabilityDate", col("PhysicalAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("StreamingAvailabilityDate", col("StreamingAvailabilityDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified.printSchema()
#display(df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified.limit(100))
## Combine all dataframes

df_unioned = (
    df_Southridge_Catalog_Modified
        .union(df_FouthCoffee_Catalog_Modified)
        .union(df_vanArsdel_Catalog_Modified)
)

# Display dataframe
#df_unioned.printSchema()
#display(df_unioned.limit(100))
## Add new ID

# Add columns
df_unioned_withID = df_unioned.withColumn("GlobalCustomerID", uuidUDF())

# Order columns
df_unioned_withID = df_unioned_withID.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'GlobalCustomerID',
    'SourceSystemCustomerID',
    'LastName',
    'FirstName',
    'AddressLine1',
    'AddressLine2',
    'City',
    'State',
    'ZipCode',
    'PhoneNumber',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Display dataframe
#df_unioned_withID.printSchema()
#display(df_unioned_withID.limit(100))
## Writing transformed data to lake
#df_unioned_withID.write.format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/curated/catalog.parquet')
